DOC.detailed_description: MSCC patient underwent palliative decompression January 2012 National Taiwan University Hospital ( NTUH ) divide preoperative motor function intact group ( Group A ) motor deficit group ( Group B ) . The motor deficit group subdivide operation within 48 hour ( Group B1 ) , 48 hour ( Group B2 ) . All patient underwent palliative decompression posterior stabilization . Investigators wide laminectomy tumor invade vertebral body , debulking surgery tumor destruct posterior column spine . Investigators retrospectively review patient record , include patient demographic , prognostic factor survival ( Kaplan-Meier survival analysis ) , neurological outcome ( Frankel grade ) , primary tumor , complication , relevance Tomita Tokuhashi score .
